import React, { useState } from 'react'; import classes from './addressForm.module.css'; function AddressForm(props){ const [mob, setMob] = useState(" "); function addressSave(event){ event.preventDefault(); //Mobile no validation if(mob.length < 10) alert("Minimum length is 10"); else if(/^\d+$/.test(mob) === false) alert("Please enter a valid 10 digit mobile number"); else if(/^[6-9]\d{9}$/gi.test(mob)) alert("Please enter a valid 10 digit mobile number"); } function mobHandler(event){ const no = event.target.value; setMob(no); } return(

CONTACT DETAILS

ADDRESS

); } export default AddressForm;
